textMap.ITALIAN: Test
textMap.ENGLISH:
For quite a bit, you have been following a thin but quite deep river. Walking upstream, the soft and constant noise of the water rushing next to you is soothing and familiar.

After so many days wandering around without a clear direction, it feels nice to have a landmark to follow, a little path towards something.

Like an ancient road, the stream of water guides you up on a steer cliff, sneaking around rocks and trees, cutting deeply into the firm earth of the woods undergrowth. 

As you push forward, the forest remains eerily calm and silent, the occasional snaps of twigs or rocks getting loose and rolling downhill is the only sound that dances with the cold water splashing, its constant presence similar to a soft hush in a library or church.

textMap.ITALIAN: Prosegui oltre cercando di guadare il fiume
textMap.ENGLISH: Press onward and try to find a path to the other side of the river

textMap.ITALIAN: Osserva il fiume da vicino
textMap.ENGLISH: Look closely at the river

textMap.ITALIAN: Fermati e siediti vicino al fiume, ascoltandone la voce
textMap.ENGLISH: Stop and sit near the river, listening to it's voice

39e9cb13-0030-4930-83f5-3421a390dcc5.name: Look closely at the gentle water

textMap.ITALIAN: Nel denso della foresta odi la gentile canzone dell'acqua che scorre tra le pietre.
textMap.ENGLISH:
In the thick woods, the gentle lullaby of rushing water can be heard, sneaking its way among the dark bushes and the low branches, like a distant melody of the forest.

It takes some time to reach it, as the ground is slowly rising into a cliff, making navigation quite hard. Chasm and fallen trees often block your path, sharp stones start to emerge from the soft undergrowth more often, trying to bite at your ankles and making it hard to keep your footing.

At last, the river is in front of you. It’s a large and deep thing, it’s water clear and fast, killing any hope to try and traverse it, as you would be easily swept away against the large stones that often sleep barely below the surface.

textMap.ITALIAN: Prosegui oltre
textMap.ENGLISH: Press onward

textMap.ITALIAN: Fermati e siediti sulla riva del fiume, ascoltandone la voce
textMap.ENGLISH: Stop and sit near the river, listening to it's voice

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
The water flows gently along the rocks lazily reflecting what little light drips between the folliage above your head.

You can see the smooth pebbles on the river bed, their dull colors slightly painted by little algae. 

Among them, you catch something small and shiny hidden under the layer of rocks.

textMap.ITALIAN: Prosegui oltre
textMap.ENGLISH: Press onward

textMap.ITALIAN: Fermati e siediti sulla riva del fiume, ascoltandone la voce
textMap.ENGLISH: Stop and sit near the river, listening to it's voice

textMap.ITALIAN: Allunga una mano e prova a raccogliere l'oggetto luccicante
textMap.ENGLISH: Reach out and try to retrieve the shiny item

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
The water flows gently along the rocks lazily reflecting what little light drips between the folliage above your head.

You can see the smooth pebbles on the river bed, their dull colors slightly painted by little algae. Among them, you catch the weird shape of something buried under the rocks, it's color a bright off white tinge.

textMap.ITALIAN: Prosegui oltre
textMap.ENGLISH: Press onward

textMap.ITALIAN: Fermati e siediti sulla riva del fiume, ascoltandone la voce
textMap.ENGLISH: Stop and sit near the river, listening to it's voice

textMap.ITALIAN: Allunga una mano e prova a raccogliere l'oggetto pallido sotto la superficie
textMap.ENGLISH: Reach out into the water to retrieve the pale item

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
In the river bed, small, colorful flowers blossom, gently moving despite the strong currents, bobbing and swaying under a soft wind that cannot be. 

Their scent is sweet and seems to come from the river itself, the water protecting this hidden garden.

textMap.ITALIAN: Prosegui oltre
textMap.ENGLISH: Press onward

textMap.ITALIAN: Fermati e siediti sulla riva del fiume, ascoltandone la voce
textMap.ENGLISH: Stop and sit near the river, listening to it's voice

textMap.ITALIAN: Allunga la mano nell'acqua per cogliere i fiori
textMap.ENGLISH: Reach out into the water to pluck off some of the flowes

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
In the river bed, small, colorful flowers blossom, gently moving despite the strong currents, bobbing and swaying under a soft wind that cannot be. 

Their scent is sweet and seems to come from the river itself, the water protecting this hidden garden.

textMap.ITALIAN: Prosegui oltre
textMap.ENGLISH: Press onward

textMap.ITALIAN: Fermati e siediti sulla riva del fiume, ascoltandone la voce
textMap.ENGLISH: Stop and sit near the river, listening to it's voice

textMap.ITALIAN: Studia il fiume
textMap.ENGLISH: Concentrate on the river

d645f40a-afae-4a5f-8b53-f8ec2f4590b9.name: Reach out and pluck off some flowers

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
The water it's so cold that it seems like it's coming from a glacier, yet, as your fingers get closer to the flowers, you feel a sense of warmth and comfort in you bones.

Your fingers touch one of the delicate pink petals, but the plant seems to shatters in sharp shards of colored glass. Your blood starts dripping into the clean water as the newborn blades dig deep under your skin, biting and burrowing in their new home.

When you pull out the bleeding fingers from the water, you can see bright pink shard of sharp glass where your nails should be.

textMap.ITALIAN: Prosegui oltre
textMap.ENGLISH: Press onward

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
You plunge your hand into the cold waters, reaching to the bottom of the shallow river to grasp some of the exotic flowers that seems to grow on the river bed and yet, despite how close they are to the surface, you cannot seem to ever touch them.

You find yourself nealy shoulder deep into the water, your hand grasping at nothing more than rushing water even if you can clearly see that those alluring plants are well into your reach, when you feel watched. 

Rising your head and looking in the calm darkness of the forest, you freeze as you spot two plucked out eyes dangling from a thick thorn bush. For a moment you wonder if a stray bird has impaled them on the wicked thorns fo the plant as a way to hide a tasty snack for himself. 

Then, the bush seems to move, wines and branches parts away like snakes under it's dangling eyes, revealing a small bird nest behid a wall of theets like thorns. In the nest lays a small black crow, it's stance signaling that it's currently incubating something under it's ruffled feathers. As the thorns starts moving again, the raspy voice of the bird melts with the snapping of wood and rustling of leaves, forming a voice.

"Who are you that coven my childs? Are you here to pluck them from their rightfull house?"

textMap.ITALIAN: Preparati a combattere. Estrai un arma ed affronta la creatura X
textMap.ENGLISH: Prepare for a fight. Reach for a weapon and try to strike the entity X

textMap.ITALIAN: Inchinati e chiedi perdono
textMap.ENGLISH: Kneel down and beg for mercy

textMap.ITALIAN: Prega e parla con l'entità
textMap.ENGLISH: Prey and talk to the creature

textMap.ITALIAN: Offri un dono alla creatura
textMap.ENGLISH: offer a gift to the entity

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
The water it's so cold that it seems like it's coming from a glacier, yet, as your fingers get closer to the flowers, you feel a sense of warmth and comfort in you bones.

Under the tip of your fingers the flowers feel warmth and welcoming, and you easily pull them out of the river bed. 

Still wet, they gliten in the soft light of the woods, their colors bright and nearly dazing, more similar to those of a painting than those of a real plant. 

They look deeply out of place in the  washed out surrounding and you take great care in putting them away safely so to not ruin one of the few gorgeous thing you have found in this world.

textMap.ITALIAN: Prosegui oltre
textMap.ENGLISH: Press onward

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
The water it's so cold that it seems like it's coming from a glacier, yet, as your fingers get closer to the flowers, you feel a sense of warmth and comfort in you bones.

Under the tip of your fingers the flowers feel warmth and welcoming, and you easily pull them out of the river bed. 

Still wet, they gliten in the soft light of the woods, their colors bright and nearly dazing, more similar to those of a painting than those of a real plant. 

You barely a few moments to admire them, before they start to rot before your very eyes, the bright petals curling and darknening, shrivering in contact with the air, no longer shielded by the cold water of the river.

Still, you decide to keep them, carefully placing the now essicated plant away for future use.

textMap.ITALIAN: Prosegui oltre
textMap.ENGLISH: Press onward

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
Sitting down on the soft moss, you take a long breath and close your eyes, focusing your mind on the soothing sound of the water dancing between the rocks. 

It feels weirdly familiar, but you cannot properly grasp where you have already heard it.

As you let the gentle sound embrace you, a cozy darkness fills your mind and you slip into your dreams

textMap.ITALIAN: Dormi un sonno senza sogni
textMap.ENGLISH: You sleep a dreamless sleep

textMap.ITALIAN: Sogni il sogno del Bugiardo
textMap.ENGLISH: You dream a Liar's dream

textMap.ITALIAN: Altri sogni
textMap.ENGLISH: Press onward

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
Sitting down on the soft moss, you take a long breath and close your eyes, focusing your mind on the soothing sound of the water dancing between the rocks. 

It feels weirdly familiar, but you cannot properly grasp where you have already heard it.

As you let the gentle sound embrace you, a cozy darkness fills your mind and you slip into your dreams

textMap.ITALIAN: Dormi un sonno senza sogni
textMap.ENGLISH: You sleep a dreamless sleep

textMap.ITALIAN: Sogni l'incubo del Bugiardo
textMap.ENGLISH: You dream a Liar's nightmare

textMap.ITALIAN: Altri sogni
textMap.ENGLISH: Press onward

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH: Type here the event's text.

c4dd1cc8-3aa1-4870-8cb7-e7867bd036e8.name: Reach out and try to retrieve the pale item

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
You notice what looks like a dull, pale root between two particulary colorfoul rocks. In the bed of grey and round pebbles it's straight shape catches your attention and you lean forward towars the rushing water.

As your fingers close around the item, you can feel that it's weirdly warm to the touch, and nearly weighless. It's not easy to dislodge it and you briefly fear that it will snap in hald, but you manage to pull it out from the water. 

And whater dripps down back into the river, you observe what you have collected.

It's a thin bone with small, irregular holes along it's lenght. The bone is mostly hollow, making it look like a flute or harmonica.

textMap.ITALIAN: Prosegui oltre
textMap.ENGLISH: Press onward

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
On the flat and rocky bottom of the river you can see what it looks like a weirdly shaped rock. It's pale and round, with what looks like small engraving on it. 

The water is cold and hostile when you push your hand down to retrieve the rock. As your warm fingers brush into the surface of the pale shape underwater, a joilt of cold thunder snakes up your arm, stopping your useless hearth for a few seconds and letting an indifferent darkness swallow your senses.

When you open your eyes again, you lay down on the wet grass near the river, clinging your hands around a finely engraved skull.

textMap.ITALIAN: Getta il teschio in acqua e procedi oltre
textMap.ENGLISH: Trow the skull back into the water and resume your journey

textMap.ITALIAN: Tieni con te il teschio misterioso e procedi lungo la tua strada
textMap.ENGLISH: Keep the weird skull with you and get back to your journey

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
On the flat and rocky bottom of the river you can see what it looks like a weirdly shaped rock. It's pale and round, with what looks like small engraving on it. 

The water is cold and hostile when you push your hand down to retrieve the rock. As your warm fingers brush into the surface of the pale shape underwater, a joilt of cold thunder snakes up your arm, stopping your useless hearth for a few seconds.

With a gasp you pull the skull back towards your chest, the pale bone still dripping and your heart still hurting in your rib cage. The wind seems to change, bringing out the darkest of shadows from under the roots of the woods, like a dark veil was swallowing the ground around your feet... or is it just your vision getting dimmer?

textMap.ITALIAN: Rigetta il teschio in acqua e procedi oltre, prima che sia troppo tardi
textMap.ENGLISH: Trow the skull back into the water and resume your journey before it's too late

textMap.ITALIAN: Tieni il teschio stretto al tuo petto
textMap.ENGLISH: Cling to the weird skull, pressing it into your chest

textMap.ITALIAN: Evento di smistaggio tra tutti i percorsi, da definire una volta definiti tutti. Place holder.
textMap.ENGLISH: Evento di smistaggio tra tutti i percorsi, da definire una volta definiti tutti. Place holder.

textMap.ITALIAN: Prosegui oltre
textMap.ENGLISH: Press onward

176acebd-6b07-45ba-bc06-7803cf9b6e3f.name: Reach out and try to retrieve the shining item

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
You notice what looks like a shiny root between two particulary colorfoul rocks. In the bed of grey and round pebbles it's straight shape catches your attention and you lean forward towars the rushing water.

As your fingers close around the item, you can feel that it's weirdly warm to the touch, and nearly weighless. It's not easy to dislodge it and you briefly fear that it will stay trapped under the heavy rocks, but you manage to pull it out from the water. 

As the water drips down back into the river, you observe what you have collected.

It's a small shortsword, it's hand guard ruined by rust, but the blade looks still sharp. It's metal has a veirdly green tint, and it's no longer straight after who knows how many times scraping against the rocks on the river bed.

textMap.ITALIAN: Assicura la piccola spada alla cintura e prosegui oltre
textMap.ENGLISH: Fasten the shortsword to your belt and press onward with your journey

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
You notice what looks like a shiny pebble between two particulary colorful rocks. Among the dull colors, it's shiny metal seems to reflect the light of the sun right into your eyes. 
Kneeling down next to the river, you lean forward towars the rushing water.

As your fingers close around the item, you can feel that it's nearly weighless and you can easily fish it out from it's watery prison.

As the water drips down back into the river, you observe what you have collected.

It's a small metallic lighter, with the engraving of an eagle on both sides. The top of the lighter can be opened and, even if it is wet and the top seems to be nearly rusted shut, you think it can still somewhat function.

textMap.ITALIAN: Lascia l'accendino scivolarti in tasca e prosegui oltre
textMap.ENGLISH: Put the lighter in your pocket and press onward with your journey

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
You notice what looks like a shiny pebble between two particulary colorful rocks. Among the dull colors, it's shiny metal seems to reflect the light of the sun right into your eyes. 
Kneeling down next to the river, you lean forward towars the rushing water.

As your fingers close around the item, you can feel that it's nearly weighless and you can easily fish it out from it's watery prison.

As the water drips down back into the river, you observe what you have collected.

It's a small metallic lighter, with the engraving of an eagle on both sides. The top of the lighter can be opened and, even if it is wet and the top seems to be nearly rusted shut, you think it can still somewhat function.

As you inspect the small lighter, you start feeling a burning sensation on your skin, your hairs curling as if a massive fire was barely a few inches from you. Looking around, the whole woods seems to be getting tinted in the red light of an invisible fire.

textMap.ITALIAN: Getta rapidamente l'accendino nel fiume e prosegui oltre
textMap.ENGLISH: Trow the lighter back into the water and press onward with your journey

textMap.ITALIAN: Tieni con te l'accendino
textMap.ENGLISH: Keep the lighter with you

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH: Type here the event's text.

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
It's hard to remember when you stop to rest for the last time, and it's even harder to think of how you will find the strenght to get back on the path if you stop now. 

Every bone in your bony is aching, a dull, constant ache that it's somewhat becoming normal after... days? Weeks? Who knew.

Slowly you sit down on the slightly wet grass, your back resting against a sturdy and trunk. Everything is slightly dump and uncomfortable, and yet it felt so easy to close your eyes and just concentrate on your breathing.

There was a scent in the air. It reminded you of freshly cut hay, yet there was more to it. It was sweet, like honey and mint, so soft that you could easily miss it yet once you become aware of it ... ignoring it was impossible.

textMap.ITALIAN: Cerca di ignorare il profumo e rimani a riposare
textMap.ENGLISH: Try to ignore the smell and just rest

textMap.ITALIAN: Cerca di ignorare il profumo e concentrati sul fiume
textMap.ENGLISH: Try to ignore the scent and focus on the nearby river

textMap.ITALIAN: Cerca di individuare la fonte del profumo X
textMap.ENGLISH: Try and locate the source of the scent X

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
It takes some times to get back on your feet. 

It takes even more time to start walking among the threes, leaving the path you where following behind.

Each step was guided by the fragrant aroma in your nose, like a trail of sweet scents that was invisible, yet so clear to you.

As you get closer and closer to the source, you start hearing a low, melodic, buzzing. 

Finally, pushing yourself past some thick vines and thorny bushes, you are able too see what you where unknowingly looking for.

In front of your, a large [Descrizione di un alveare pieno di insetti, la descrizione si adatterà a quello che ci produce l'IA].

textMap.ITALIAN: Studia l'Alveare da lontano
textMap.ENGLISH: Study the Hive from afar

textMap.ITALIAN: Cerca di raccogliere la sostanza zuccherina prodotta dagli insetti
textMap.ENGLISH: Try to collect some of the Hive's glistening honey

textMap.ITALIAN: Cerca di distruggere l'Alveare
textMap.ENGLISH: Try and destroy the Hive

textMap.ITALIAN: Resisti al richiamo di quel profumo e torna su i tuoi passi
textMap.ENGLISH: Shake away the scent from your mind and go back towards the old path

textMap.ITALIAN: Ignora l'Alveare e continua ad inoltrarti nel bosco
textMap.ENGLISH: Keep your distance from the Hive and keep going deep into the woods

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH: Type here the event's text.

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH: Type here the event's text.

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH: Type here the event's text.

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH: Type here the event's text.

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
As you kneel down, you can feel the air becoming heavy around you.

The birds, the rushing water, the wind between the foliage; everything seems to stop to witness what is happening.

With a sound of snapping wood and brushing leaves, the creature slowly moves, but you do not dare to look up at it. 

You can hear as it circles around you, slow and deliberate, like the lazy blossoming of a flower.

When the pain snaps you back into reality, it's as sudden as it is sharp. A long, deep gush has been opened on your back, a thin and warm dribble of warm blood rushing down your skin.

When you look up, the creature is no more. As silently as it has came, he disapeared, leaving a small bracelets of thorns behind you, along with a painfull reminder of your crime.

textMap.ITALIAN: Dolorante, riprendi il tuo cammino
textMap.ENGLISH: Hurt and tired, get back up and start walking again

textMap.ITALIAN: Raccogli e indossa il bracciale di spine prima di riprendere il tuo cammino
textMap.ENGLISH: Take the thorn's bracelet and slip it on before going back to your journey

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
As you kneel down, you can feel the air becoming heavy around you.

The birds, the rushing water, the wind between the foliage; everything seems to stop to witness what is happening.

With a sound of snapping wood and brushing leaves, the creature slowly moves, but you do not dare to look up at it. 

You can hear as it circles around you, slow and deliberate, like the lazy blossoming of a flower.

A raspy voice, more like the brushing of wood against wood and the distant voice of crows, sneaks into your hears from behind your back.

"Why are you here, children of Men?"

textMap.ITALIAN: "Non lo sò, sono solo un viandante"
textMap.ENGLISH: "I do not know, I am merely a traveler"

textMap.ITALIAN: "Sono in cerca del mio cammino"
textMap.ENGLISH: "I am looking for my Path"

textMap.ITALIAN: "Non ti riguarda chi io sia o dove sto andando, fatti da parte"
textMap.ENGLISH: "Who I am and where I am going is my business, leave me alone"

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
As you kneel down, you can feel the air becoming heavy around you.

The birds, the rushing water, the wind between the foliage; everything seems to stop to witness what is happening.

With a sound of snapping wood and brushing leaves, the creature slowly moves, but you do not dare to look up at it. 

You can hear as it circles around you, slow and deliberate, like the lazy blossoming of a flower.

When the pain snaps you back into reality, it's as sudden as it is sharp. A long, deep gush has been opened on your back, a thin and warm dribble of warm blood rushing down your skin.

When you look up, the creature is no more. As silently as it has came, he disapeared, leaving you with a painfull reminder of your crime.

textMap.ITALIAN: Dolorante, riprendi il tuo cammino
textMap.ENGLISH: Hurt and tired, get back up and start walking again

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
It is hard to tell if the creature is answering you or if it even heard you. 

Around you, all that it's heard is the silent presence of the woods, with it's slithering, crawling, rushing and brushing sounds; but is this not the language of your guest?

Finally, just before you decide to stand back up and look around, a slow and gentle snapping of woods, similar to the warm sound of a fireplace, brushes your hears.

"You are not someone. You were and you will be for the present is a tale you do not know."

Those words that are not words at all cut deep into you, giving you the strenght to turn around.

Behind you, the creature is no more. A small bird nest made of scraps of bloodied tissues and twigs lies on the ground with a single, spekled, black and brown egg in it.

textMap.ITALIAN: Confuso ma sollevato, decidi di procedere oltre verso il tuo cammino
textMap.ENGLISH: Dazed but safe, you decide to go on with your journey

textMap.ITALIAN: Raccogli l'uovo e lo metti delicatamente nel tuo zaino prima di procedere lungo il tuo cammino
textMap.ENGLISH: You pick up the misterious egg and carefully put it in your backpack before going back to your journey

events.name: I am looking for my path

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
It is hard to tell if the creature is answering you or if it even heard you. 

Around you, all that it's heard is the silent presence of the woods, with it's slithering, crawling, rushing and brushing sounds; but is this not the language of your guest?

Finally, just before you decide to stand back up and look around, a slow and gentle snapping of woods, similar to the warm sound of a fireplace, brushes your hears.

"A destination without a road, a river that goes to no lake. You will dry up into nothing."

Those words that are not words at all cut deep into you, giving you the strenght to turn around.

Behind you, the creature is no more. A small bird nest made of scraps of bloodied tissues and twigs lies on the ground with a single, wet looking, pale human eye in it.

textMap.ITALIAN: Confuso ma sollevato, decidi di procedere oltre verso il tuo cammino
textMap.ENGLISH: Dazed but safe, you decide to go on with your journey

textMap.ITALIAN: Raccogli l'occhio e lo metti delicatamente nel tuo zaino prima di procedere lungo il tuo cammino
textMap.ENGLISH: You pick up the grousome eye and carefully put it in your backpack before going back to your journey

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
It is hard to tell if the creature is answering you or if it even heard you. 

Around you, all that it's heard is the silent presence of the woods, with it's slithering, crawling, rushing and brushing sounds; but is this not the language of your guest?

Finally, just before you decide to stand back up and look around, a slow and gentle snapping of woods, similar to the warm sound of a fireplace, brushes your hears.

"A fiery critter, a fearsom bug. Blind to the woods you will die underfoot."

Those words that are not words at all cut deep into you, giving you the strenght to turn around.

Behind you, the creature is no more. A small bird nest made of scraps of bloodied tissues and twigs lies on the ground with a single, mummified, dried up grasshopper in it.

textMap.ITALIAN: Confuso ma sollevato, decidi di procedere oltre verso il tuo cammino
textMap.ENGLISH: Dazed but safe, you decide to go on with your journey

textMap.ITALIAN: Raccogli l'insetto e lo metti delicatamente nel tuo zaino prima di procedere lungo il tuo cammino
textMap.ENGLISH: You pick up the dry grasshopper and carefully put it in your backpack before going back to your journey

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH: Type here the event's text.

textMap.ENGLISH: Type here the event's text.

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
As the darkness rises from the grass under you, a dull sound of bones against bones catches your attention from behind you,

The creature emerging from the hollow trunk of a nearby three is tall and somehow regal in it's presence. It's exposed bones are perfectly white, it's flesh having long been disposed off by endless creatures.

It moves with solemnity, it's bone fingers graspin at the air in front of him, painting mute words on the wind and yet, even if they make no sense to you, each unspoken word is clear as day.

"Pay" 

"Savage"

"Thief"

Each mute word is filled with a cold, indifferent hate, as the skeletal figure quickly step closer, ready to face you.

textMap.ITALIAN: Estrai un arma ed affronta la creatura
textMap.ENGLISH: Take on the skeleton with one of your weapons

textMap.ITALIAN: Preparati allo scontro come puoi
textMap.ENGLISH: Brace yourself for the fight

textMap.ITALIAN: Cerca di scappare
textMap.ENGLISH: Try to escape it

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
As an impossible and burning warmth rises from the grass under you, a dull sound of bones against bones catches your attention from behind you,

The creature emerging from the hollow trunk of a nearby three is tall and somehow regal in it's presence. It's exposed bones a shimy tint of black, it's flesh having long been burned off.

It moves quikcly and frantically, nearly running an all fours towards you, like a beast despite the humanoid shape of it's bones.

The woods around you start to snap and moan under the assault of an invisible bonefire and the temperature rises as the furious skeletal figure runs towards you.

textMap.ITALIAN: Estrai un arma ed affronta la creatura
textMap.ENGLISH: Take on the skeleton with one of your weapons

textMap.ITALIAN: Preparati allo scontro come puoi
textMap.ENGLISH: Brace yourself for the fight

textMap.ITALIAN: Cerca di scappare
textMap.ENGLISH: Try to escape it

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
In the thick woods, the gentle lullaby of rushing water can be heard, sneaking its way among the dark bushes and the low branches, like a distant melody of the forest.

It takes some time to reach it, as the ground is slowly rising into a cliff, making navigation quite hard.

Chasms and fallen trees often block your path, sharp stones start to emerge from the soft undergrowth more often, trying to bite at your ankles and making it hard to keep your footing.

At last, the river is in front of you. It’s a large and deep thing, it’s water clear and fast, killing any hope to try and traverse it, as you would be easily swept away against the large stones that often sleep barely below the surface.

textMap.ITALIAN: Fermati e ascolta il suono dell'acqua che scorre
textMap.ENGLISH: Stop to listen to the sound of rushing water

textMap.ITALIAN: Cerca un punto dove è possibile attraversare il fiume in sicurezza
textMap.ENGLISH: Search for a spot where it's safe to cross the river

textMap.ITALIAN: Prova ad attraversare il fiume impetuoso
textMap.ENGLISH: Try traversing the harsh river

textMap.ITALIAN: Questa versione della quest è in costruzione, si viene rediretti verso quella pronta
textMap.ENGLISH: Questa versione della quest è in costruzione, si viene rediretti verso quella pronta

textMap.ITALIAN: Prosegui oltre
textMap.ENGLISH: Press onward

textMap.ITALIAN: Questa versione della quest è in costruzione, si viene rediretti verso quella pronta
textMap.ENGLISH: Questa versione della quest è in costruzione, si viene rediretti verso quella pronta

textMap.ITALIAN: Prosegui oltre
textMap.ENGLISH: Press onward

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
You follow the bank of the raging river, knowing that it would be foolish to risk breaking a leg while trying to pass it's icy waters.

It takes quite a bit, walking in the dense woods that hide the skies above you, but in the end you see a small hill and a stone bridge arching above the waters.

As  you get closer, the canopy seems to shrinks around you, and even if the trees obviously are less dense as you climb towards the bridge, you feel like their presence is closing on you and a sudden darkness covers the skies that you should be able to see and yet you cannot.

Stepping on the first of the flat stones of the bridge, you see 5 longs and stretched fingers sneak up from both sides of the well, like gnarled roots with too many knuckles and dark and thick nails. 

Fingers, as longs as your whole arm and yet barely thicker than your own digit, slowly rest on the low wall of the bridge, like the long and hairy legs of two disgusting spiders.

textMap.ITALIAN: [Continua]
textMap.ENGLISH: [Continue]

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
You follow the bank of the raging river, knowing that it would be foolish to risk breaking a leg while trying to pass it's icy waters.

It takes quite a bit, walking in the dense woods that hide the skies above you, but in the end you see a small hill and a stone bridge arching above the waters.

As you get closer, the canopy seems to shrinks around you, and even if the trees obviously are less dense as you climb towards the bridge, you feel like their presence is closing on you and a sudden darkness covers the skies that you should be able to see and yet you cannot.

On the bridge you can see a figure, standing tall in the middle of the bridge. Even if you cannot see it's face, you can feel it's eyes on your as it silendly awaits.

textMap.ITALIAN: Prosegui oltre
textMap.ENGLISH: Press onward

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
Finding a bridge where to cross could take hours, if it even exists, so you decide to face the river head on.

The river is not particularly deep, probably as deep as your hips are tall, yet you don't fancy your chances against the very fast current and the uneven river bed.

There are various rocks emerging from the rushing water, their flat surface offering you a wet and slippery path towards your unknown goal.

With a deep breath, you brace yourself as you start traversing the river on the flat stones. Each small jump is a test of your abilities as your ruined boots slide and slip on the stones, a single mistep will send you thumbling down in the icy cold waters.

Despite quite a few close calls, you manage to finally jump to safety with nothing worse than a pair of wet boots.

textMap.ITALIAN: Prosegui oltre
textMap.ENGLISH: Press onward

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
Finding a bridge where to cross could take hours, if it even exists, so you decide to face the river head on.

The river is not particularly deep, probably as deep as your hips are tall, yet you don't fancy your chances against the very fast current and the uneven river bed.

There are various rocks emerging from the rushing water, their flat surface offering you a wet and slippery path towards your unknown goal.

With a deep breath, you brace yourself as you start traversing the river on the flat stones. Each small jump is a test of your abilities as your ruined boots slide and slip on the stones, a single mistep will send you thumbling down in the icy cold waters.

You are nearly to the other side when finally your luck runs out and one of the stones moves slightly under you. 

In just a few moments, you find yourself plunging in the rushing water as the sounds of the wood are drowned into a wet gurgling sound.

So you sink.

And sink.

It's impossible, the whole river should merely be three to four feet deep, and yet you can see the surface slipping away from you. Among the bubbles and rocks, you can see pale hands made of gnarled bones as they grasp at your legs and arms, pulling you down, scratching and bruising you as they greedly call you into their cold realm.

textMap.ITALIAN: Sprofonda
textMap.ENGLISH: Sink

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
Cold.

Dark.

Sinking down, or maybe rising up... you really do not know, for there is nothing up and there is nothing down.

Dark shapes move, immense and careless, in the slightly less deep darkness around them.

The more you sink, the less you feel like you are sinking. It feels like you... belong there. Alone.

textMap.ITALIAN: Respira
textMap.ENGLISH: Breath

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
As your head emerges from the cold water, it feels like your lungs are filling up for the first times in years.

Air has become a weird, unwelcoming presence inside you, but there it is. Looking around, your hands are grasping at the rocky terrein at the other side of the shallow river.

Coughing up dark water, you manage to push yourself out of the river and unto dry land. 

Your muscles are nearly frozen, your skin purple and scratched. You feel barely able to walk and stand up, but you fight to keep going on.

textMap.ITALIAN: Lascia l'Abisso dietro di te e procedi lungo la tua strada
textMap.ENGLISH: Leave the Abyss behind and go on with your path

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
Like mist from the river down below, a voice slowly rises, as mellifluous and disgusting as the thin fingers that slowly move from left to right, feeling the stone next to your feet like brisles of a disgusting insect.

"I am born in the sky and I am trapped in a coffin

I am the voice that never sleeps 

a scream from around the world, the voice of a lover that you never met

I am chaing but I will be free, with the turn of a pebble"

textMap.ITALIAN: Sussurri la parola "Libro"
textMap.ENGLISH: You utter the world "Book"

textMap.ITALIAN: Sussurri la parola "Millepiede"
textMap.ENGLISH: You utter the world "Millipede"

textMap.ITALIAN: Sussurri la parola "Banshee"
textMap.ENGLISH: You utter the world "Banshee"

textMap.ITALIAN: Sussurri la parola "Lupo"
textMap.ENGLISH: You utter the world "Wolf"

textMap.ITALIAN: Sussurri la parola "Radio"
textMap.ENGLISH: You utter the world "Radio"

textMap.ITALIAN: Stringi i denti e provi ad avanzare in silenzio
textMap.ENGLISH: You grin your teeth and try to force your way forward in silence

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
It happens so suddenly that you don't even feel the pain at first. 

You took a single step, maybe, before you feel the sharp pulling at your limbs. 

Confused, you can feel each of them being pulled into a different direction, as muscles get tore and bones snap out of position.

Then, the pain explodes in your body, a simpony of pure blinding agony that pushes your mind deep in a place where it tries to hide. 

Breathless, you find yourself on the stone floor of the bridge, alone, with the distant sound of a bird chirping and the soft rays of the sun caressing your agonizing body.

textMap.ITALIAN: Prosegui oltre
textMap.ENGLISH: Press onward

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
As soon as the word escapes your lips the finger shiver in bliss, their long nails scarping against the mossy cobblestone of the bridge.

They sneak back down into the abyss, their unseen hand disapearing back under the bridge and the darkness evaporates with them.

A low, crackling laughter echoes briefly in the air before disapearing under the bridge.

Still unwelcoming, but familiar now, the path ahead is now open, awaiting for you at the other side of the bridge.

textMap.ITALIAN: Prosegui oltre
textMap.ENGLISH: Press onward

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
Like mist from the river down below, a voice slowly rises, as mellifluous and disgusting as the thin fingers that slowly move from left to right, feeling the stone next to your feet like brisles of a disgusting insect.

"I am born from the earth and I am trapped in flesh

I am the hunger that never sleeps 

I coil in the mouth, flickering tongue

as I protect out legacy with all of myself"

textMap.ITALIAN: Sussurri la parola "Libro"
textMap.ENGLISH: You utter the world "Book"

textMap.ITALIAN: Sussurri la parola "Millepiede"
textMap.ENGLISH: You utter the world "Millipede"

textMap.ITALIAN: Sussurri la parola "Banshee"
textMap.ENGLISH: You utter the world "Banshee"

textMap.ITALIAN: Sussurri la parola "Lupo"
textMap.ENGLISH: You utter the world "Wolf"

textMap.ITALIAN: Sussurri la parola "Radio"
textMap.ENGLISH: You utter the world "Radio"

textMap.ITALIAN: Stringi i denti e provi ad avanzare in silenzio
textMap.ENGLISH: You grin your teeth and try to force your way forward in silence

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
Like mist from the river down below, a voice slowly rises, as mellifluous and disgusting as the thin fingers that slowly move from left to right, feeling the stone next to your feet like brisles of a disgusting insect.

"I am born in freedom and trapped in my family

I am the companion that never sleeps 

I look from afar, I remember your scent

I dress like you, to get what is mine"

textMap.ITALIAN: Sussurri la parola "Libro"
textMap.ENGLISH: You utter the world "Book"

textMap.ITALIAN: Sussurri la parola "Millepiede"
textMap.ENGLISH: You utter the world "Millipede"

textMap.ITALIAN: Sussurri la parola "Banshee"
textMap.ENGLISH: You utter the world "Banshee"

textMap.ITALIAN: Sussurri la parola "Lupo"
textMap.ENGLISH: You utter the world "Wolf"

textMap.ITALIAN: Sussurri la parola "Radio"
textMap.ENGLISH: You utter the world "Radio"

textMap.ITALIAN: Stringi i denti e provi ad avanzare in silenzio
textMap.ENGLISH: You grin your teeth and try to force your way forward in silence

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
The closer you get, the clearer it becomes. On a thin wooden bridge, with woods and mist around you, it came.

Tall, silent, regal and utterly indifferent, you knew who you are facing. In the light stuck in it's empty sockets lie the truth that a man can never dream to know.

"Turn a way" it says without speaking.

"Search another path, for this is not a path for the likes of you to take, if they wish to ever come back from it."

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH:
Getting closer to the tall figure, you notice how it's not looking at you.

It's facing towards a point in the misty nothingness that surrounds this bridge.

"Have you left someone behind you, I wonder?"

The voice is weirdly familiar, yet hard to place. It's not masculine nor femminine, it's not young nor old. It's a voice that you know for sure, and yet you have never heard.

textMap.ITALIAN: Prosegui oltre
textMap.ENGLISH: Press onward

textMap.ITALIAN: Inserisci qui il testo dell'evento che il giocatore leggerà a schermo.
textMap.ENGLISH: Type here the event's text.
